NAME: Kona
AUTHOR: Alzarath
DESCRIPTION:
Search https://konachan.com/ for anime wallpapers.

Usage: [p]kona [tags...]: Fetch the latest image
[p]konar [tags...]: Fetch a random image
[p]konafilter list: Lists all filters applied to the server
[p]konafilter add [filter name]: Add a filter to the server
[p]konafilter del [filter name]: Delete a filter from the server

Disclaimer: By default this cog does not display NSFW content, but it is able to through setting filters.
